Html:
I am trying to connect to a web service that is hosted on an IIS server.  The web service requires an HTTPS connection and a user name & password.  The IIS site's security is configured for "Basic" authentication.

I see that I can enter a WebServiceUsername & WebServicePassword in the Configuration area (lower left of the GUI) *after* connection has been established with the web service and a method is being called, but I am not seeing how to get those credentials to be used when connecting to the URL in order to retrieve the WSDL.

Suggestions? 

Thanks  :)

You should be able to set the user/passwd from the

                Configuration Menu -> Service tab

before discovering the wsdl. Also please see the related issue http://www.codeplex.com/storm/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=2180 which has already been fixed
